original_text:
As goods increase,
    so do those who consume them.
And what benefit are they to the owners
    except to feast their eyes on them?
korean_text: 재산이 많아지면 먹는 자들도 많아지나니 그 소유주들은 눈으로 보는 것 외에 무엇이 유익하랴

sentences.original_text: so do those who consume them.
And what benefit are they to the owners
except to feast their eyes on them?
sentences.korean_translation: 그저 눈으로 보는 것 외에 무엇이겠느냐
